title: Public Holiday (Declaration) Notice, 2015
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 257
Gazette dated Friday, 23rd October, 2015
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 78 OF2015
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws,Volume15,Cap.272)
The Public Holiday (Declaration), Notice, 2015
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section three of the
PublicHolidaysAct,thefollowingNoticeisissued:
1. ThisNoticemaybecitedasthePublicHoliday(Declaration) Title
Notice,2015.
2. It is declared that the 18th of October in every year, Declaration
commencingwith18thOctober,2016,shallbeobservedasapublic ofpublic
holiday
holiday, being a day of national prayer, fasting, repentance and
reconciliation.
EDGARC.LUNGU,
LUSAKA President
22ndOctober,2015
[CO.101/9/1]
